summary: A stranger and a bandit seek out a trio of playing cards that will lead them to hidden treasure.
cast: Dragomir Bojanic-Gidra|Robert Hundar|Rosy Zichel|Gianni Brezza|Giorgio Gargiullo|Giuseppe Addobbati|Elsa Janet Waterston|Gino Marturano|Mario Dardanelli|Bruno Cattaneo|Corinne Fontaine|Giuseppe Castellano|Amerigo Castrighella|Enrico Chiappafreddo|Alberigo Donadeo|Rocco Lerro
title: Un agujero en la frente
